text: Don’t waste your time!. These are AWFUL. They are see through, the fabric feels like tablecloth, and they fit like children’s clothing. Customer service did seem to be nice though, but I regret missing my return date for these. I wouldn’t even donate them because the quality is so poor.
Belt loops. Belt loops were not fastened upon opening. They were not stitched.
Didn’t fit. Ran entirely too small
One Star. NEVER RECEIVE THIS PRODUCT EVEN AFTER CONTACTING THE SELLER MORE THAN ONCE

Child hat way too small. The child hat is ridiculously small. It was not even close to the right size for my 3 year old son. I checked the size, and it wouldn't have even fit him as a newborn. I liked the adult hat but it is not sold separately. The seller was rude and unhelpful when I contacted them directly through Amazon. The faux fur pom was either already torn or tore when I was trying on the hat. See the attached photograph. The pom came aprt, exposing the inner fluff.

Wrong size. I ordered this bodysuit in 3-6 months and they sent me a 6-12 months. The label on the plastic bag says a different size of the one in the label on the bodysuit. I don’t know if I should order it again because I am afraid they would send me a completely different size.
I want my package. I don’t receive my package until now I check the front desk nothing and my mail box so what up with that though?

Pads aren’t secured! Lace buckles!. You will have Lopsided cheeks if you don’t adjust the pads each time you pull them up after using the bathroom. The lace rises and buckles causing bulges through your pants.
Worst thing I ever saw. This item arrived with several cracks from the packaging. I left on the dashboard of my car and it melted. Worst thing I ever saw.

Wrong shirt sent!. I bought the surprise shirt for grandparents, but was sent one for an aunt. I was planning on surprising them with this shirt tomorrow in a cute way, but now I have to postpone the get together until I receive the correct item sent hopefully right this time.
Also really poor quality. Not worth your money. Sizing runs really small. Order a size or two up. Also really poor quality. Not worth your money.
Needed someone to contact about not receiving product. Unfortunately never received product
Bad bad bad quality! Not durable at all!. Nice style, but quality is too low! It simply fell apart! And I just tried it on, didn't have time to wear
Terrible straps. This item is terrible for pregnant woman! Poorly designed! Poor quality! The straps just keep popping off and it’s even big on me. When I adjust it nothing changes. Do not buy.
Bad quality. Holes all over the dress, terrible!!!
Not as advertised. This shirt is one length all the way around. It does not drape or fall as it looks in the picture. Will be returning!
Fantastic belt, love it. Fantastic belt ,love it . This is my second one , the first one was a little small but this one is perfect. I suggest you order one size bigger than your waist size.
Low quality!. This dress is trash! Not even worthy of a house dress. Literally just pieces of material sewn together. Absolutely no workmanship or quality about it! DO NOT BUY!!!!

Runs smaller than what states in picture. This product is to small to even fit on my waste lining! Made in China so I assume a person that is normal in US large must be a very 3x person over there. But it is what it is!
Disappointed b/c I am 5'10 and wanted to wear with .... This shirt is not long as the picture indicates. It's just below waist length. Disappointed b/c I am 5'10 and wanted to wear with leggings.
One Star. High wasted, does not fit properly. Material not right for that design of the dress does not flow.
Softness...not!. I have severe allergies and ordered them because the product info stated they were the softest handkerchief on the market. NOT soft at all...Don’t bother!
Never received it. Never received this item waiting on a email from someone..
Rough material. Poor quality.. Super poor quality. Rough material. However if this is just used for a photo shoot it is cute.
Poor quality and nothing like the picture. Poor quality and nothing like the picture
Waste. Some of the undies fit wonderful but other pairs are much smaller. Waste of money!

Not as it seemed.. When I opened the bag the product smelled of chemical. Which isn't very surprising. Thought I just may have to wash it. I held it up and the fabric was awful. Itchy feeling and very heavy. I tried it on anyway once again I thought after wash this may change. Well it felt heavy on and it has no shape. This is not breathable fabric at all. So I did not wash it repackaged it and sent it back. I bought it to hang around the water park or beach with the kids as a cover up. Nope
Smell horrible. Neck comes apart. Smell terrible and neck is coming apart sent back

Quite possibly the WORST adhesive EVER. The adhesive is not put around the entire edges of the cup, so the pasties folds awkwardly leave your breasts appearing oddly shaped and the cup prone to peeling off. Made this completely unwearable.
Wrong sizes listed, belts way to small, and .... Wrong sizes listed, belts way to small, and now they are out of stock till after xmas, this was supposed to be a gift.
Bad smell.. The fabric has an awful odor, even after washing. Fabric also had a hole in it. Really liked style, though.
Wrong size sent. Love the material but I ordered x-large and received xxx-large. I won't be ordering any more from this bunch.
Issues with Garment. One of the products I received has a hole in it. It is not a problem necessarily, since I could still wear it under something, but still not very disappointing.
Don't fit. Too tight in waist.. Waist is too tight. Doesn't fit. I tried a 44 and that's too large. What I need is a 43 but that is not available. I'm lost.
Don't do it!. Very thin, see-through material. The front is much longer than the back.
Runs small. Loved it to bad it didn’t fit
Don't buy! Waste of money. There are terrible! One sock is shorter and tighter than the other. The colors look faded when you put them on. These suck
Cute Dress but not what I ordered. I did not receive the dress I ordered
One Star. This item runs extremely small.
Looks like a cartoon Jean painted on leggings. Not worth it. Looks like a cartoon Jean painted on leggings.

Poor quality. I bought this for my sons birthday party and one hour into it I noticed a tear in the back of his shirt where his arm is. I was so embarrassed when someone asked me about it and had to change him midway through his party. It was brand new never been used and tore within an hour.
One Star. The belt started to slip after a month
Discolored. Disappointed. There's this pink discoloration all over the back of the shirt. It's like someone already wore this

size up girls. I like this swim suit but it fits really small. I am a size 14 and per reviews that's what I ordered. It runs really small. Also a lot of mesh in the back and on the sides of this suit. Don't like that. its going back....sad

Asian size more fitting for a DOLL not a Human.. Cheap material/fabric. Won't survive one wash. Asian size that will only fit a Doll not a Human. Once again sellers are Amazon listing clothes as American sizes but not referencing that the product is from China or Asian Country. Don;t buy this, you will be wasting your time to mail it back.

Uncomfortable!!!!!. I bought the tie-dyed version and it was SO comfortable. Stretchy breathable material. I decided to buy the black version for work. Bad decision! The material is completely different. It doesn’t stretch, it’s not breathable and it is very small and uncomfortable! It even seems it’s stitched differently so that it coveres 50% less of my head. So disappointing!!
I got pink/girls underwear.. I received girls instead of boys that I ordered. I returned and ordered it again, hopefully I get the correct one.
One Star. The dress looked nothing like the picture! It was short, tight and cheap looking and fitting!

Shipping Nightmare. swimsuit indicated that it was Prime and consistently shipping dates kept getting pushed out to a later time. The swimsuit ended p coming after my vacation which was completely disappointing and while contacting Amazon and Cupshe, nobody could give me a proper update as to when I would receive it.
One Star. The hot glued parts are falling off.
Not all cotton. Navy color is 40% polyester. Stitching coming loose after a few washes.
Doesn 't stay on. After use, became too loose.
Quality. The quality of the fabric is not that good, although the price is pretty low.

2 bad lemons in a row :(. I ordered from this company because I've bought it previous seasons and it worked great for us. This season I bought the next size I needed. One of the pajamas I received had a hole on the foot of the pajama. I returned it and the company sent me a new one. The replacement pajama my son wore one time, I put it in my washing machine just like always and the zipper broke off! I'm so disappointed because I don't have time to be dealing with returns every few days and yet that is what is happening right now.
Side panels are see through. These are really more like tights than leggings, especially on the side panels which are completely see through.
TERRIBLE. ordered product in MARCH has not arrived as of MAY 11. Attempt to contact seller and NO response!

Sizing is VERY incorrect. I ordered two pairs of these shorts and was sent completely wrong sizes. I have both pairs same item ordered and the shorts are completely different sizes but are labeled the same size. One pair is 4 inches longer than the other.
It was the wrong color cant use. It was the wrong color

Soft, but not good enough quality. Soft... Which is why I haven't thrown it away.. but it doesn't seem durable and the waist line is uncomfortable. I suggest wearing these around the house :) I haven't trusted to wear them outside.
Not for big boobs. The small was entirely too small I’m a 36DD waist 29 hips 40 the boobs did not fit at all so if you’re busty order a size up

More like nylons, not tights or pants!. These "tights" are very thin, which I didn't expect given that they were also described as cropped pants. They are too small, although I ordered the large that was specified for my size (I wear a 6 or 8 in U.S. sizes). I can barely get them on, and I am afraid of ripping them. I will probably not wear them; not what I expected at all.
Two Stars. Rinse small. Not colorfast. Color runs even after a few washings.
Two Stars. Nice color but needs to be ironed to wear
Cheap. Cheap made but not cheap price. Wire in wing took no time to be poking out.

Cheap and broken on arrival.. I am very unhappy with the helmet I received, it came out of the box warped (the shape of the helmet was bent like it had been squished.) The antennae on the side of the helmet had snapped off and will need to be glued back on. There's a really garish emblem on the back of the helmet that's part of the helmet mold so it can't be painted over. I'd say the only saving grace about this helmet is that it's big enough to fit my fat head. Overall you'd be better off buying a helmet off of Etsy.
Order 2 sizes larger for length.. Very short on the sides. Overall, good fit but I do not like to show my belly. Too bad lad got that. Fabric very soft.
Elastic waistband. Do not like the elastic waist at all. Very uncomfortable. Material is thin but soft.

Poor quality. Fit a little more snug than I expected after reading other reviews, but still happy with my purchase. Update: Right after my original review two small holes on the shoulder seam appeared. I wouldn’t buy this again.
Wrong color and size. I received wrong color and wrong size.
Two Stars. Really cute, but the underwire dug into my ribcage.
Two Stars. Too large need to send back for smaller size
Not true.. These are comfortable but still sweaty they're not what I expected.
Cute hat but for narrow faces. I loved the hat but I have a wider face. The bill didn’t quite look right- was too narrow for my face so I returned it.
None. I’ll pay extra money to come in early and they come in a month
White is see through. This fit well so I can't complain about that. The white is just so see through. Will probably never wear it!

Two different materials. Flowers look super fake.. This item was way too oversized. The floral print on sleeves is a different material than the black middle of the top. The flowers also look super fake.
Cute but not the best quality. Shirt was cute but quality of material was not great

CHEAP looking. I was so disappointed in these shoes. They took so long to be delivered, without and shipping updates whatsoever. When I finally got them I discovered a cheaply made shoe. The platform is either styrofoam or a stacked cardboard like material, and the straps are a very thin and cheap looking felt. The buckle on the ankles do not even properly clasp. I’m giving this product two stars because in pictures and from a distance they do serve the look I am trying to achieve.

... Expected it to be made out of a material like a bath towel. Too Warm - Expected it to be made out of a material like a bath towel. Very soft, but seems like an old lady would wear this to stay warm inside a building that the A/C is on in the summertime on a 95 degree day...
No lift. No support. Just seemed to keep the ladies pushed down and against me. Returning.
Two Stars. Fits kind on tight in the chest area and I'm a 38B and purchase large
Two Stars. Great style and pattern but Material is cheap and looks it.

Very thin material, the small fit very large, .... Very thin material, the small fit very large, especially in chest. Not sure who this would fit it's just a strange design and material. For reference I am 5'8, 130lbs, 32DD. Provided no support as well and very flimsy
Too small for Credit cards. Purchased 2 of these for me and my son. It is way too tight to fit credit cards into the slots that they are supposed to fit in.
Two Stars. Bottoms are great, but absolutely no top support
Not very good quality. I bought the breathable version and it doesn't really do a good job of shaping. After wearing it twice, one of the steel bones started poking out.
The sizing was way off. Bought size XL for .... The sizing was way off. Bought size XL for my daughter who wears a medium bottom and large top. The size was so small

Hole in the arm after wearing it twice. Bought the black one with flowers on the sleeves and hood. This is my second time wearing it, and a big hole is forming on my l the left arm from the thread loosening. Returning for poor quality.

Nursing bra. The design is cute but the sleeper bra fits weird. It's tighter under the boobs and loose in the cup area so that when i lay to the side my boob doesn't stay in the bra. Can't wear them to actually sleep in otherwise I'll run the risk of leaking all over my bed.
Disappointed. I’m afraid this body shaper was not for me. Gave me a really weird shape . Not at all comfortable. Will be sending it back.

Way too small even for small toddler. My daughter is very small for her age, she’s 2 and on the 5th percentile. These were small on her and I was honestly looking for underwear that would run small but there have a bikini cut or something so her butt cheeks are out on the sides, she’s a toddler so I dont need that, we needed comfort and coverage since she’s still new to going potty consistently. I gave it two stars, delivery was timely and fine but the product was definitely disappointing.
Awful Packaging. I was very excited to receive this mask for event, only to receive it un wrapped in a cardboard box with scuffs and scratches all over the face mask
Not my style. The top rolls and the crotch rises up, I didn’t find them comfortable.

not for workout. If you sweat anywhere at all on your body when you workout, these pants will be look very wet at the slightest touch of moisture. Not for working out. Like baggy sweats that then close circulation just below the knee...
Didn't like. I sent this back. Waaayyy to big. And the material/quality wasn't good enough for me to spend almost $30.

Pictures pi look different then actual item. On the picture the dress looked like it had flare at the bottom turns out it doesn't. It is just a straight dress that is high in the front and low in the back. Not what I expected
I was not given an option to choose a size. they were too large I'm a woman's size 81/2 and I was not given an option to choose a size.
Not as expected. Not sure about every one else but the sticky part to actually lift does not stick quite well. I find myself constantly readjusting.
Poor fit. Wide at the top, tight around the hips. It looks weird and unflattering!
Outfit came with extra piece of material I wasn’t sure .... Outfit came with extra piece of material I wasn’t sure what it was for.
Fit as expected, however there was a defect on .... Fit as expected, however there was a defect on the sleeve that i didn’t notice until after I washed it.

Run big, see through, very long. Do not recommend for the price.. For the price of these leggings I would say they are not good quality. They are very see through. Even if you take your hand and stretch the fabric you can see directly through it. These leggings are extremely long. I am 5'6 and normally need a long inseam and these are much too long for me. They bag and roll behind the knee with the extra material and don't lay right since they are too long. I would also suggest to size down since they run big in my opinion.

Too big in the Waist. The proportions of the pants did not fit my body. The pants were snug in the legs (as desired), but it was way too big in the waist. I am 5'3, 120 lbs and I ordered an xs. I fear the xxs would be too tight in the legs. I am returning this item.

Not for me. I wanted to love this suit!! The pattern is adorable! I ordered an XL (I’m usually a 10-12, between medium and large in pants and tops) so I thought it would be plenty big enough. It barely covered my behind and left me with lots of side boob. After 2 pregnancies my boobs are not what they used to be, but based on where these cups fall you would think they were sagging to my belly button!! The straps in the back cut into me and made it hurt to wear, and if I were to cut them to make it a halter my boobs would be out and about. It just fell so awkwardly on me! The suit I got was the same as the first picture in description. Cute print and nice fabric, but def not for me

Not worth buying. I weigh 165lbs and typically wear a medium size in top and large at the bottom. The top is way too big and the padding is very odd. It looks unflattering. It would look better on someone who has a bigger chest. However, I did like the bottoms, but they are pretty revealing. Also the color in the picture is way off from the color i actually received. Overall I'm disappointed with this purchase.
Small. Looks good fits a kid too small
Cheap. You get what you pay for. Clasp always comes undone and change spills out.
Not a fan. Did not work for me. Too big in the midsection, and too short. Not a flattering look at all.

Large hips beware. First of all I'd like to know who got the devilish idea to add pockets to all dresses sold on Amazon. This is a really nightmare! The dress fit, and it's beautiful but because I do have large hips as an hourglass shape, the pockets make me look even larger. This is so disheartening. I hope I'll find a nice dress for my next trip to Jamaica!

No shape. Fits like an oversized potato sack.. Not flattering at all. Loved the print and the material was nice and thick. Good quality but the cut of the dress is not good. It doesn't hang all cute like the pic, but more like a think, stiffer flannel.
NOT LEATHER AS ADVERTISED. The desciption needs to be changed to PU leather, NOT LEATHER! this is wrong!!!!

Not impressed. The concept of this would be great but the silicone band (for preventing slipping) is not stretchy enough and makes it impossible to get over my hips. And my hips are not that large... I'm not convinced it would be all that comfortable for a petite person either since the fabric is more stretchy than the silicone. I ended up sending this one back.

Fabric color changed after wearing one time! :(. The fit was perfect and I love the light blue color. However, after I wore it one time and hand washed and air dryed the suit, part of the material changed color. It has gray areas all over it. I'm very disappointed. I don't understand why better material wasn't used because it felt great on!
good price. after washing. Well made, good price.after washing, dye ran lines diwn front of jeans

Groovy Papaya not as expected. The groovy papaya colorway has a scripted champion logo stitched on on the picture on Amazon, but what came was a hoodie with just the "c" logo on the top right of the chest
Bikini and hipster panties are two different things. These are bikini, not hipster. Returned.
Not what I expected. These were smaller than expected and the material wasn't very soft as described. They are also not high-waisted as stated in the description

Odd fit. It seems to run small yet the arms run so long you have to fold the sleeves if you want to wear it. It doesn’t look good that way. I also had a hard time deciphering the front from the back because neither way for right. I’ll never wear this. I have it two stars versus one because the look of it is exactly what I was hoping for.

It looks like it was meant for a much older woman. Fits big. I bought this dress (short sleeve). Not flattering at all. It looks like it was meant for a much older woman. It would look great on a senior who doesn’t mind wearing a shorter dress, or maybe to be comfy around the house. I plan to return it.

Came stained. I had been wanting this wallet for a long time. But the ID windows came stained with ink and the plastic is opaque and not clear and see-through, which sort of defeats the purpose of having ID windows. The rest of the wallet looks great, but I'll have to return it because not being able to use the ID windows makes it not functional

Weird marks on fabric, returned. The fit of this shirt was great and flattering, but the material was so weird! It was loose and clingy at the same time, I don't even know how you do that. It came with tons of white marks on front, back and at the seams, either where the product was folded or stretched, it looked dirty. I have no idea if this will come out in the wash so I returned before finding out. Two stars for fit only.

Lacks quality.. I have had this hat for 2 weeks now and have worn it a few days (4 or 5 days). It is super comfortable, but really lacks quality. The velcro is already separating on the back strap so I'll need to sew it up.
Too small!. Very small!! Too short on my 7 year old.

Too small. This product did not arrive as described. Only tried on the top and it is WAY to small, not consistent with measurements shown. I don’t think I was sent the correct item and there’s not option to return for correct item. Disappointed!

Skirt fits tight/narrow over plus size shorts. Nice shiny smooth material, long enough, but the skirt fits super tight and slides up. Seriously, for the size they made the shorts underneath, which fit perfect on a 5’8’’ size 18, the skirt is like a super tight pencil skirt, the skirt is more a size 14-16. It might work better if I lose another 10 lbs, but then the shorts might be too baggy. And the inside front has this white secondary panel. I guess it’s for not showing anything on the front? But it’s stupid and super itchy and makes the suit fit all thick and bunchy on the front, and it’s waist band to knees, left outer seam to right outer seam. The back is smooth and silky and comfortable. Not gusseted, so it could crawl up if you get it fit too tight. I’m cutting out the weird white liner to see if that helps anything, and maybe the skirt wont slide up when it’s wet, or I may tack it to the side seam on the shirts. And no drawstring at the waist, which fits well on a small waist/ big booty combo, but might get heavy and pull down in water. Other than that, it’s a good length, hits the top of my kneecap/crease at the back of my knee.
Not good for working in the cold. Didn’t keep my hands warm at work stocking frozen foods
Two Stars. It's was nice but had a en hole in it up in the front of it.

Size is good. Good condition. Color was not rose gold as per the picture. It is almost write gold. Inside silver is as expected. Size is good. Good condition, good terminations. Disappointed only with the color.
Cheap material. The material was cheap and ripped after a few wears and washes - will not purchase again

Order a larger size than what you usually wear.. These leggings run small. I would recommend ordering at least 1 size larger than your normal size. They are very well made. An FYI the white legging is transparent.
Nothing. I didn't like it I received the wrong product
Fun, too small. I love the idea of Jack on my socks, the were way too small. I did give them to my daughter, she wares them.

Great concept but some flaws. I really like the concept of this belt and how it works. As a plus size person I find this belt easy to use and tighten. But I am giving a two star review for two reasons. 1) the buckle is very heavy for its size. Not sure if it’s how it is designed but feels heavy and bulky 2) the class that holds the buckle on slips. I like my belt tight but the teeth just dig in and the “leather” just pulls and stretches.

Mine were defective - read further. Very nice suspenders but mine are defective. One of the clips is missing the nylon teeth insert and does not hold onto pants. This makes them useless. However, if they were not defective, they would have been great suspenders. I will try my luck again likely.
Poor Quality. I wore these bras about 2 times each by the 3rd time the underwire came out. I don't recommend buying these bras. They're a waste of money
Two Stars. Not anough coverage across the chest. My tits hang out
Cheap cheap cheap. Cut and material are terrible. I would have returned these but my son saw them and wouldn’t let go :-)

Runs small!. This runs small,order a size up and it is “ok “,but not comfortable-Plus it has those tiny little snaps and takes a few minutes to get them attached-I wear it because it does work well for me , but I don’t love it-It’s stiff and uncomfortable just dosent have the flexibility I like-I’m sure it would be hot in summer I-Spanx is much more comfortable for every day even though it’s more expensive-

Thin and Cheap Material. Material is too thin, cheap and itchy. I bought a pair of leggings from Costco and the material was thicker than this jeggings. Definitely going back, too bad was so excited about it.
Very cheap feeling.. The materiel of the bra is very rough.

Not for everyone. Don't like the whole silk nylon feel of this item way too hot for summer and uncomfortable for something that's supposed to clean to you again very small not for thicker women if you have a flat stomach you maybe to pull this off Constable however it is a hot material so I would recommend wearing it at night when you're going out or something is not something that you would think of cloth that you can wear during a summer day and just don't some cute flip flops it's very hot very tight and weird material

Really big and boxy. Order size down.. I am a size 10 and I ordered a L. It is huge and boxy on me. The sleeves are even too long ( I am 5'7 so its not that I have short arms). Maybe a small would have fit better. I would return it but I didn't try it on when I got it and now it is too late.
Just a simple t-shirt. Nothing spectacular about this product. The color is more lighter than I expected. Feels likes a regular t-shirt.
low rise, not stretchy. these were too small but my biggest problem is how low rise they are, and have very little give in them
Great. They work great easy to use

Disappointed there are no care instructions. Dress fits perfectly. Item is as described. Disappointed there are no care instructions. The dress is extremely wrinkled and I now have to pay to have it professionally cleaned and pressed to remove the wrinkles... all that aside, it is a beautiful dress.
Four Stars. These are very comfortable and I like the variety of colors as I wear many different colored pants.
Love the fit!. Great jacket for a great price. I honestly cannot complain. It keeps me warm though sometimes leaves feathers behind. Overall a great buy! Will buy in another color

Runs a little large.. I originally ordered the 3x top, but it was a little too big in the bust. Sized down to the 2x and it's almost perfect. A little bit of rolling up, but other than that, super cute top.
Warm. Super warm and stylish hat but runs large on me. Well made and washed well without fading or losing its shape.

Mostly great product. Excellent quality shirts in my opinion but absolutely they run large. I will toast mine in the hot water washer and dry on high to see if they'll shrink down, and report back. The sleeves of the t-shirt are longer than the sleeves on my short-sleeve button down shirt.
Four Stars. Very comfortable. love it
Very nice.. The color looks very rich and the fabric feels good on the skin. Runs a little snug tho.
Runs small. I ordered medium (typically I am a small) because I read the reviews that it ran small. I wish the tanks were a still little bigger.
Cute. Wish the lenses were a bit darker.
Good quality but runs quite small.. Good quality but runs very small. I’m usually a medium or large, purchase an xl for comfort and it barely fits. The quality of the shirt is nice though.
liked it now I purchased two more. I had purchased one about a year ago, liked it now I purchased two more.

beautiful, but not hourglass. Its a beautiful top but I had to return the medium to get a large. the fit was fine except for the hip area. If you have hips, order a size up from your usual, otherwise it won't hang right on you.

Couldn't go wrong on this one!. I liked the price, color, fit, adjustable option & quality of the hat. I did not want a floppy beach hat, nor a dressy looking one & this one is great for everyday use & will go with whatever you're wearing.
Cute blouse but different pattern than pic. Loved the color but the flowers aren’t in the same place as pictured. Didn’t like the huge rose in the front/at mid-chest
Four Stars. Just okay but fits decently
Great. Minor inconsistencies but perfect for my use

Great fit, but a little stiff. Very comfortable, although the material is a little stiffer than I had expected. I marked "fit as expected" but I purposely ordered one size below what I would normally wear. It's a bit snug, but I'm happy.
Alright. Runs small, cute 2 piece.
Finding these was like Goldilocks finding the porridge that was 'just right'. Just what I needed. Finding these was like Goldilocks finding the porridge that was 'just right'.

beautiful but recommend good garment tape. bought this for a Vegas trip, it was beautiful and fit well, but I didn't quite realize HOW low the v-neck was. Tried using garment tape but couldnt get it to hold--if you have a way to keep it strapped down, then I say give this one a try. I'm sad I didn't get to show it off on my trip
Awesome dress but it's a bathing suit cover up everything is see through. Love this dress but it's more of a bathing suit cover up because the dress part is completely see-through

Gave as a gift and the person loved it. Plus they had to wear a full .... Gave as a gift and the person loved it. Plus they had to wear a full leg brace and didn't want to put on socks so this worked perfectly.
Feels great. Feels great, love the high top, I wish I could pull it up better from the back

I ordered a small and it actually could have been a bit more fitted.. I love the top so flattering and sexy. My one criticism would be I wish the material was thicker. Because it’s thin I have to wear a strapless bra wish I don’t really need but too revealing otherwise. I wore last night tho and got tons of compliments!
Love this dress. Love this dress! Wedding, school, it is perfect for any situation with the right accessories! The fabric is a bit sheer when stretched, but its soft and comfy!

Really nice wallet, good quality.. I love the wallet. Works almost as expected. Cards can not be inserted fully or they get stuck in switching than unable to remove cards easily. Other than that issue the wallet is great. I leave my cards inserted only 3/4 in to prevent issues.

Needs two clasps. I love it. Few things I don't love is it's not as detailed as I thought it would be and the metal is not as strong and bends easily. Also wish there were two clasps on the back instead of just one so it'll stay on my vest without spinning.
One smaller size please otherwise it’s perfect. The dress is beautiful. The size I order was a little laser for me so go for one smaller size

Runs a bit big.. These run big. If you want them to go under jeans or other pants then you need to go down a size. If you're wearing them as pj bottoms or just on their own then get them true to size for a comfy loose fit.

Honest. I have mixed thoughts on this skirt. For 1- I’m usually a small, I’m 5’5 and roughly 120 pounds, but I had to order an XL to fit me (and it’s still a smidge tight) but still wearable. The color seemed brighter to me than displayed in the pictures. I ordered a burgundy and it still is burgundy but looks more red than I would have liked, maybe that’s just personal preference. Also kinda see- through. You can’t see underwear lines or anything but you can clearly see leg imprints right through the dress. It’s jusy an OK skirt to me. Not bad, but not excellent. Great for less dressy occasion- festivals or beaches, etc.
Seems split after an hour of wear. Beautiful but the seems split in the fingers after an hour of wearing at a cocktail party.

Comfy and soft. Really like these. I wear them to bed under nightgown and they are so comfy. Don't pinch or ride up. I gave it 4 stars because the black one is much smaller than the rest so I can't wear them. I will reorder these.

Not for longer torsos. Overall the swimsuit is great- while it fit the body, it was too short for the torso. I am 5’7” and it hardly pulled up my chest. It otherwise fit great but seemed about 2” too short and would’ve had the girls falling out the top! The swimsuit is very high quality, gorgeous print and customer service is great though! I’ll just stick with 2 pieces for my torso length. I have several other Tempt Me suits and they are all perfect!
Tiny!. Great quality but TINY

Just what i needed. Great shirt fit as expected love the saying.

Just as described. This is a basic puffer coat. If you are seeking a basic coat, then this coat will meet expectations. The coat arrived in a vacuum sealed bag so it needs to be hung up for a few days to let wrinkles come out and to "puff up" a bit. I am 5 ft 6 inches and the coat is knee length on me. I ordered 2+ sizes up due to other comments and past experience, and the coat is probably a bit larger than needed. However, with heavier sweater or sweatshirt, it should be fine. There are no cuffs on the sleeves so I will likely add those later. The hood functions, but no ties on it. The front zipper works. There are no vents in the side or back for added movement, but with the larger size, I should have plenty of room. There are two pockets at my waist (may be higher or lower on you). There are no trims or styling details-- it is a BASIC COAT. For the price, I think it is fine. I did wear it on a windy day, but not cold. I could not feel the wind, so I feel that is a good sign. However, I am curious how it will perform in the colder temps and in the rain/snow (supposed to be resistent). Overall, I am pleased. The vacuum seal bag can be re-used and the seller included a really cute thank you note which was a great touch.

Really works, heavy construction. Even though I returned it I gave it four stars because it worked as advertised. One should be aware that for the garment to do the lifting and shaping that it does, It requires the seams to be very heavy and I found the anal area to be uncomfortable, however I know with time I probably would have become used to it, but I chose instead to try a different product.

I think this hat is best for people with thick hair. I think this hat is best for people with thick hair. I have very thin hair, the pony tail has to be so high, to fit through the hole, that what's left of my pony tail is pretty straggly. I'm going to try a top knot next time I wear it

Better than my leather wallet. I had items in my leather wallet that I didn't really ever use, so being able to carry the day-to-day items only in my Fidelo wallet is working great. So far, I'm enjoying it.

Pretty. Decent quality.. These are very cute and the nylon is soft and stretchy. They are not all the same size band though. Some are tighter than others. And several of the bows are on white bands, which I didn't really notice in the picture, but they are still pretty. Unfortunately my baby doesn't like the thicker bands and keeps pulling these off. She doesn't mind the thin nylon bands.

I am a proud customer.

Not made for us short girls. I love the feel of these pants. They are extremely comfortable and lightweight. I only wish they made them in a petite length. I’m 5’2” and 140 lbs at 6 months pregnant. The length of the pants are probably about 3 inches longer than what I need. I’ll deal with it because they’re so comfortable, but would give 5 stars if they came in petite.

See More Vividly. Well, Here's the deal...The product arrived on time and in good condition. Very nice packaging makes this perfect for gift wrapping and giving as present. It also come with a nice storage bag and glass case along with a lens cloth. These are plastic lenses...so use the protective cases or they will scratch just like any other plastic lens. These are of the blue blocker variety and they work! Nicely styled with lightweight aluminium alloy frames and comfortable nose pads. I plan to use them for shooting at the range, as well as for night driving. Good bang for the buck...if you protect them. There you have it.

Don’t take seller’s advice. Based on the reviews and the seller’s advice, I sized up to a M when I normally wear an XS/S. Unfortunately, the stitching on the shoulder of the M far surpasses my petite, narrow shoulders, so it sticks waaaay out and makes me look like a football player. When I bunched the material to fit my shoulder, it looked perfect. Therefore, even though this one didn’t work for me, I think it’ll be great when I return it for my true size. Not sure why everyone says to size up, as there is a plenty of extra material... It’s made to be a baggy crop top. Unless you have extra broad shoulders, just order your real size so that it’s a baggy crop top that properly fits and looks good.

does what they are designed for. These socks have good compression, but I'm not a huge fan of how itchy they are.
